ctx: intros T U F G FF D f g H H0 H1.
exceptions.tactic: apply (filterlim_comp_2 f g (fun x y => x = y) FF (filter_filter G) (filter_filter F)).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type f, g : T -> U H : forall x : T, D x -> f x = g x H0 : filterlim f (within D F) G H1 : U -> Prop The term "FF" has type "Filter F" while it is expected to have type "filterlim f ?F ?G".

ctx: intros T U F G FF D f g H H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type f, g : T -> U H : forall x : T, D x -> f x = g x H0 : filterlim f (within D F) G H1 : U -> Prop H2 : forall (f g : U -> U) (h : U -> U -> U), filterlim f G G -> filterlim g G G -> filterlim (fun x : U * U => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod G G) G -> filterlim (fun x : U => h (f x) (g x)) G G H3 : G H1 Unable to unify "filterlim f (within D F) G" with "filtermap g (within D F) H1".

ctx: intros T U F G FF D f g H H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type f, g : T -> U H : forall x : T, D x -> f x = g x H0 : filterlim f (within D F) G H1 : U -> Prop Unable to unify "forall P : U -> Prop, ?G P -> filtermap g ?F P" with "Filter G".

original: intros T U F G FF D f g H H0 H1. apply (filterlim_comp_2 f g (fun x y => x = y) FF (filter_filter G) (filter_filter F)). - apply H0. - apply (filterlim_ext_loc f g). + intro. apply Eqdep.EqdepTheory.Streicher_K. + apply H1.
